fullplot: Based on the true story of a black girl who was born to two white Afrikaner parents in South Africa during the apartheid era.
plot: Based on the true story of a black girl who was born to two white Afrikaner parents in South Africa during the apartheid era.
title: Skin

tomatoes.consensus: Sophie Okonedo, Sam Neill, and Alice Krige do wonderful work in Skin, delivering performances whose strength is underlined by the incredible real-life events upon which the movie is based.
